channel.title: Comments on: Three months of Central America and Mexico in photos

item.title: By: Erika
item.dc:creator: Erika
item.description: At least the plus side of everyone thinking life outside the Mexican resorts is unsafe means that much of Mexico's interior is unspoiled by large crowds and tour groups. It sounds like a wonderful tour of Central America. If you loved Guatemala, I recommend you return sometime to visit Nicaragua...lots of beautiful cities and wonderful nature to explore.
item.content:encoded: At least the plus side of everyone thinking life outside the Mexican resorts is unsafe means that much of Mexico’s interior is unspoiled by large crowds and tour groups. It sounds like a wonderful tour of Central America. If you loved Guatemala, I recommend you return sometime to visit Nicaragua…lots of beautiful cities and wonderful nature to explore.

item.title: By: Sarah Duff
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/three-months-of-central-america-and-mexico-in-photos/#comment-199685">Katarina</a>.
Hi Katarina, thanks for being such an avid follower of the blog! I have been travelling - through Central America, Iceland and Europe - and I took a little break from blogging. Working through my blogging backlog at the moment!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Katarina.

Hi Katarina, thanks for being such an avid follower of the blog! I have been travelling – through Central America, Iceland and Europe – and I took a little break from blogging. Working through my blogging backlog at the moment!

item.title: By: Katarina
item.dc:creator: Katarina
item.description: I thought you were traveling! It made me a bit worried when you didn't post anything for several months! Can we have a little warning next time or was this completely unplanned/away from internet? Good to know you're safe! Beautiful photographs as always!
item.content:encoded: I thought you were traveling! It made me a bit worried when you didn’t post anything for several months! Can we have a little warning next time or was this completely unplanned/away from internet? Good to know you’re safe! Beautiful photographs as always!
